headline: Blackstone to Present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, August 26, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE:BX) announced today that Michael Chae, Vice Chairman and Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, September 9, 2025 at 11:15 am ET.
